TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit EastAsianLunisolarCalendar extends System.Globalization.Calendar
Public MustInherit Class EastAsianLunisolarCalendar Inherits Calendar
public ref class EastAsianLunisolarCalendar abstract : System::Globalization::Calendar

summary.span: 表示一种日历，它将时间分为月、日、年和纪元，并且其日期基于太阳和月亮的循环。

span.span: Represents a calendar that divides time into months, days, years, and eras, and has dates that are based on cycles of the sun and the moon.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类除了 solar 年和阴历月还支持甲子循环的年 （重复每隔 60 年）。The class supports the sexagenary cycle of years (which repeats every 60 years) in addition to solar years and lunar months. 在日历中每个 solar 年都与甲子年相关联 (请参阅)，一个天干 (请参阅)，和地面分支 (请参阅)。Each solar year in the calendar is associated with a Sexagenary Year (see ), a Celestial Stem (see ), and a Terrestrial Branch (see ). > [!NOTE] > 有关使用信息类和其他日历.NET Framework 中的类，请参阅[使用日历](~/docs/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars.md)。For information about using the class and the other calendar classes in the .NET Framework, see [Working with Calendars](~/docs/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars.md). 一年可以具有一年中，任何月后的闰月并且每个月可以具有闰日。A year can have a leap month after any month of the year, and a month can have a leap day. 例如，方法返回一个正整数，表示与指定的日期相关联的月份。For example, the method returns a positive integer that indicates the month associated with a specified date. 如果，在一年的第八个和第九个月之间存在闰月方法的第八个月内，闰第 8 个月的 9 和 10 中的第九个月返回 8。If there is a leap month between the eighth and ninth months of the year, the method returns 8 for the eighth month, 9 for the leap eighth month, and 10 for the ninth month. 每个支持一组的日历。Each supports a set of calendars. 目前，没有任何派生的阴阳历类所有支持的区域性所用的类。Currently, none of the lunisolar calendar classes that derive from is used by any of the cultures supported by the class. 因此，此类和派生自该类可以用于只计算东亚阴阳历中的日期。Therefore, this class and those that derive from it can be used only to calculate dates in the East Asian lunisolar calendars. 此类支持多个"get"方法来描述阴阳历，所使用的术语中，方法将从阴阳历数据到。This class supports several "get" methods to describe a in the terms used by lunisolar calendars, and the method to convert from lunisolar calendar data to a .

span.span: Working with Calendars

related.span: 示例： 日历周范围实用工具

span.span: Sample: Calendar Week Range Utility

override this.AddMonths : DateTime * int -> DateTime

param.name: time
param.span: 要向其添加月数的 。

span.span: The to which to add months.

param.name: months
param.span: 要添加的月数。

span.span: The number of months to add.

summary.span: 计算与指定日期相距指定月数的日期。

span.span: Calculates the date that is the specified number of months away from the specified date.

returns.span: 一个新的 ，通过在 参数中添加指定的月数得到。

span.span: A new that results from adding the specified number of months to the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所产生的日部分如果结果的日期不是结果生成的年的月份中的有效日期影响。The day part of the resulting is affected if the resulting day is not a valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 在这种情况下，日部分已更改为生成的年在生成每月最后一个有效的日期。In this case, the day part is changed to the last valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 所生成的年份部分受影响，如果结果的月份之外的指定年份。The year part of the resulting is affected if the resulting month is outside the year of the specified . 此实现支持仅为当前纪元。This implementation supports only the current era. 因此，如果生成的年之外的指定纪元，且引发。Therefore, is thrown if the resulting year is outside the era of the specified . 所生成的时间的日部分保持不变，与指定。The time-of-day part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 例如，如果指定的月份是 10 月，包含 31 天，指定的日期是该月的第一天和的值`months`参数为 6，生成的年是一个多个指定的年份、 生成每个月是年 4 月，和结果日期是 30 日，即在年 4 月的最后一天。For example, if the specified month is October, which has 31 days, the specified day is the thirty-first day of that month, and the value of the `months` parameter is 6, the resulting year is one more than the specified year, the resulting month is April, and the resulting day is the thirtieth day, which is the last day in April. 如果的值`months`参数为负，从而早于指定。If the value of the `months` parameter is negative, the resulting is earlier than the specified . 所返回的属性值始终等于。The property of the returned value always equals . 可以保留的属性`time`参数通过调用方法，如以下示例所示。You can preserve the property of the `time` parameter by calling the method, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/cs/add1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/vb/add1.vb#5)]

exception.span: 结果超出了 支持的范围。

span.span: The result is outside the supported range of a .
is less than -120000 or greater than 120000.
-or-
is less than or greater than .

returns.span: 一个新的 ，通过在 参数中添加指定的年数得到。

span.span: A new that results from adding the specified number of years to the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所产生的日部分如果结果的日期不是结果生成的年的月份中的有效日期影响。The day part of the resulting is affected if the resulting day is not a valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 在这种情况下，日部分已更改为生成的年在生成每月最后一个有效的日期。In this case, the day part is changed to the last valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 所生成的月份部分保持不变，与指定。The month part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 此实现支持仅为当前纪元。This implementation supports only the current era. 因此，如果生成的年之外的指定纪元，且引发。Therefore, is thrown if the resulting year is outside the era of the specified . 所生成的时间的日部分保持不变，与指定。The time-of-day part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 例如，年 2 月有 28 天，但在它时有 29 天闰年。For example, February has 28 days, except during leap years when it has 29 days. 如果指定的日期是闰年年 2 月 29 日和的值`years`参数为 1，则得到的日期将在下一 2 年月的 6:00 天。If the specified date is the twenty-ninth day of February in a leap year and the value of the `years` parameter is 1, the resulting date will be the twenty-eighth day of February in the following year. 如果`years`为负，从而早于指定。If `years` is negative, the resulting is earlier than the specified . 所返回的属性值始终等于。The property of the returned value always equals . 可以保留的属性`time`参数通过调用方法，如以下示例所示。You can preserve the property of the `time` parameter by calling the method, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/cs/add1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/vb/add1.vb#8)]

exception.span: 结果超出了 支持的范围。

summary.span: 计算指定日期中的年中日期。

span.span: Calculates the day of the year in the specified date.

returns.span: 一个从 1 到 354（在平年中）或从 1 到 384（在闰年中）的整数，用于表示 参数中指定的年中日期。

span.span: An integer from 1 through 354 in a common year, or 1 through 384 in a leap year, that represents the day of the year specified in the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一年中的一天被指从一年的第一天的天数。The day of the year is defined as the number of days from the first day of the year. 例如，对的第一个月的第一天返回 1，并的上个月的最后一天返回该年份的总天数，这相同的值返回。For example, for the first day of the first month returns 1, and for the last day of the last month returns the total number of days in that year, which is the same value returned by .

summary.span: 计算指定纪元年份的闰月。

span.span: Calculates the leap month for the specified year and era.

span.span: A positive integer from 1 through 13 that indicates the leap month in the specified year and era.

returns.span: 或

span.span: -or-

returns.span: 如果此日历不支持闰月，或者 和 参数未指定闰年，则为零。

span.span: Zero if this calendar does not support a leap month, or if the and parameters do not specify a leap year.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支持闰月日历，在特定月后或在一年中的任何月份之后发生的闰月。In a calendar that supports a leap month, the leap month can occur either after a particular month or after any month in a year. 例如，方法返回一个数字来表示与指定的日期相关联的月份的 1 到 13 之间。For example, the method returns a number from 1 through 13 that indicates the month associated with a specified date. 如果，在一年的第八个和第九个月之间存在闰月方法的第八个月内，闰第 8 个月的 9 和 10 中的第九个月返回 8。If there is a leap month between the eighth and ninth months of the year, the method returns 8 for the eighth month, 9 for the leap eighth month, and 10 for the ninth month.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可以将当前日历中的任何日期转换为公历日期。The method can convert any date in the current calendar to a Gregorian calendar date. 公历日期，随后可用，例如，来比较不同日历中的日期或特定日历中创建等效的日期。The Gregorian date can subsequently be used, for example, to compare dates in different calendars or create an equivalent date in a particular calendar.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int ToFourDigitYear (int year);

Public Overrides Function ToFourDigitYear (year As Integer) As Integer

param.name: year
param.span: 一个两位数或四位数的整数，用于表示要转换的年份。

span.span: A two-digit or four-digit integer that represents the year to convert.

summary.span: 将指定的年份转换为四位数的年份。

span.span: Converts the specified year to a four-digit year.

returns.span: 一个包含 参数的四位数表示形式的整数。

span.span: An integer that contains the four-digit representation of the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用属性来确定相应的纪元。The method uses the property to determine the appropriate century. 支持两位数年份或四位数年份。 supports either a two-digit year or a four-digit year. 传递一个两位数的年份值 (小于 100) 导致该方法将值转换为四位数字值根据值，该值表示相应的纪元。Passing a two-digit year value (less than 100) causes the method to convert the value to a four-digit value according to the value representing the appropriate century. 如果应用程序提供对在支持的日历范围内的四位数年份值，该方法返回的实际输入的值。If the application supplies a four-digit year value that is within the supported calendar range to , the method returns the actual input value. 如果应用程序提供支持的日历范围之外的四位数字值或提供一个负值，则该方法将引发异常。If the application supplies a four-digit value that is outside the supported calendar range, or if it supplies a negative value, the method throws an exception.

exception.span: 超出了此日历支持的范围。

span.span: is outside the range supported by this calendar.

summary.span: 获取或设置可以用两位数年份表示的 100 年范围内的最后一年。

span.span: Gets or sets the last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.

value.span: 可以用两位数年份表示的 100 年范围内的最后一年。

span.span: The last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性允许两位数年份，以正确转换为四位数年份。This property allows a 2-digit year to be properly translated to a 4-digit year. 例如，在公历日历中，如果此属性设置为 2029，100 年范围是从 1930 年到 2029年。For example, in the Gregorian calendar, if this property is set to 2029, the 100-year range is from 1930 to 2029. 因此，为 30 的 2 位值被解释为 1930 年，而 29 一个 2 位值被解释为 2029年。Therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 1930, while a 2-digit value of 29 is interpreted as 2029. 此属性的初始值被派生自控制面板的区域和语言选项部分中的设置。The initial value of this property is derived from the settings in the regional and language options portion of Control Panel. 但是，该信息可以更改的生命周期内。However, that information can change during the life of the . 类不检测系统设置中的更改自动。The class does not detect changes in the system settings automatically.

span.span: The current is read-only.

exception.span: 位于设置操作中的值小于 99 或大于当前日历中受支持的最大年份。

span.span: The value in a set operation is less than 99 or greater than the maximum supported year in the current calendar.
